Articles.Content:
So this is just a pilot thread, to gather information on interest. If it gains some attention, I'll press on and go ahead with organising this.

The Kerbal Collaboration (Working title) would be a collaboration youtube channel of 7 players. Each person would upload 1 video per week, on a set day, giving the channel 1 video per day. The players would each be doing a different mini-series, which would be changed around every month or two.

So, if you're interested in this, tell me below, and I'll get to work sketching a proper thread and starting an application process.
Shall I take it that this idea will never take off, then? I'd really love to get this working, but obviously we can't without interest.

Alright count me in shall you.

I have a small channel of 60ish subs 15k ish views.

I do KSPLPs and Mod reviews as well as update spotlights

https://www.youtube.com/user/dragonrider66511

Fantastic, I'll PM you shortly.

I'll also be enhancing the above thread to contain a bit more information later.
Giving up because of lack of interest.
